tech_news.title: macOS Tahoe 26.4 and iPadOS 26.4 add compact tab bar in Safari - 9to5Mac
tech_news.description: macOS Tahoe and iPadOS 26 removed support for the compact tab bar in Safari. Now, the feature is back in macOS 26.4 and iPadOS 26.4 beta 1.

tech_news.title: Apple starts testing end-to-end encrypted RCS messages on iPhone - The Verge
tech_news.description: Apple is testing end-to-end encrypted (E2EE) RCS messages with the iOS 26.4 first beta. When officially released, the feature will let iPhone and Android users send cross-platform encrypted messages.
